ygData.subject: Re: Rune Totem Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, you re really in the wrong area to buy Runed Staves.  Crushbone is about as far away from the staves as you can get ;)  I m not saying no one ever sells
ygData.messageBody:
Well, you're really in the wrong area to buy Runed Staves. Crushbone is
about as far away from the staves as you can get ;) I'm not saying no one
ever sells them there, but if you were to relocated closer to Qeynos, you'd
probably have more luck as the staves are found in that neck of the woods
and are usually sold in that area. Good Luck ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard

----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Harrington <chris-harrington@...>
To: EverQuest Wizards <eq_wizards@onelist.com>; EverQuest Povar
<EQ_Povar@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 8:16 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Rune Totem Staff


> I'm desperately looking for a Runed Totem Staff. I know there out there,
> but I've been trying to find someone willing to sell for the last 3 days
> with no luck. If you have one and you want to sell it, give me a /tell.
I
> have been hanging out in Crushbone on the Povar Server from midnight to 5
or
> 6:00 am PST.
>
> Thanks!
>
> "Maureen", Lvl 11 Wizard
>
>
